text: Bangarra Dance Theatre is an Australian dance company. It specialises in presenting works by Indigenous Australian dancers, choreographers and musicians. It began in 1989. It is based in Sydney. Bangarra Dance Theatre performed in the opening and closing ceremonies of the 2000 Summer Olympics.National Library of Australia. Bangarra Dance Theatre Australia. (1989-). Retrieved 19 October 2016. ==References== == Other websites == * Bangarra Dance Theatre's website Category:Ballet companies Category:Indigenous Australian culture Category:Musical groups established in 1989
title: Bangarra Dance Theatre
